author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat the oil in frying pan. Add the new potatoes, onion and garlic and fry for two minutes.  Add the curry powder, cumin and turmeric and fry over a high heat.  Cover the pan with a lid, reduce the heat and cook for 30-35 minutes until the potatoes are cooked.  Serve on a plate garnished with fresh coriander.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  250g/9oz new potatoes,  ½ onion, chopped,  4 garlic cloves, crushed,  2 tsp curry powder,  2 tsp ground cumin,  2 tsp ground turmeric ,  fresh coriander, to garnish
